definition: to guard/to protect/to defend/abbr. for 衛生|卫生, hygiene/health/abbr. for 衛生間|卫生间, toilet
surname Wei/vassal state during the Zhou Dynasty (1066-221 BC), located in present day Henan and Hebei Provinces
lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
variant of 視|视[shi4]/variant of 示[shi4]

sentences.english: Families gather on them to watch satellite television and DVDs.
sentences.chinese: 一家人坐在炕上看卫星电视和DVD录相。

sentences.english: Apartments include free internet access and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels.
sentences.chinese: 每间空调客房都配备了卫星电视和免费无线网络连接。

sentences.english: FPLL (Frequency and Phase Locked Loop) is a new kind of threshold extended demodulator for satellite TV receivers.
sentences.chinese: FPLL是一种新型卫星电视门限扩展解调器。

sentences.english: China has already built some receive-rebroadcast nets of satellite tele-education.
sentences.chinese: 我国的卫星电视教育收转网已初具规模。

sentences.english: Each guest room and suite is air-conditioned and equipped with a work desk and interactive TV.
sentences.chinese: 每间空调客房和套房都配有迷你吧和卫星电视。

sentences.english: Satellite TV now in China's exhibition is really quick.
sentences.chinese: 卫星电视现在在中国的怪展确实是挺快的。

sentences.english: They are in cars all day long, and they've got satellite dishes outside their houses.
sentences.chinese: 他们整天都呆在车里面，他们家都装了卫星电视。

sentences.english: In the last month, they have canceled their satellite television subscription and their Internet service.
sentences.chinese: 就在上个月，他们取消了卫星电视服务和互联网服务。

sentences.english: There is an internet terminal in the room and also a washing machine.
sentences.chinese: 大部分一室公寓和公寓还配有洗衣机和卫星电视。

definition: set-top box/decoder for digital or satellite TV signal etc

pinyin: gao1 qing1 shu4 zi4 dian4 shi4
